org.pathvisio.paver

Class TxtReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pathvisio.paver.TxtReader

  • public class TxtReader
extends java.lang.Object
    TxtReader Class.

    Text reader class for node or connection input by file. The manual input function also uses the static methods of this class.

    Author:
    christ leemans

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TxtReader(java.io.File file)
      create a new text reader to read file input
